titleStmt.title: Observations vpon Prince Rupert's vvhite dog, called Boy: carefully taken by T.B. for that purpose imployed by some of quality in the city of London.
titleStmt.author: T. B.
T. P.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeere, M DC XLIII. [1643]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
